title: Implement scalable feature flag system with user segmentation by country, region, and city
summary: Build a distributed feature flag system supporting hierarchical geographic segmentation with real-time evaluation. Must handle high-throughput flag checks while maintaining sub-10ms latency for user location-based feature determination.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: geo-targeted feature flag system for progressive delivery with location-based user segmentation (country/region/city)

title: Build percentage-based rollout mechanism (e.g., 10% Canada, 100% UK)
summary: Develop percentage-based feature rollout logic supporting granular control by geographic region. System must ensure consistent user experience through deterministic hashing while allowing dynamic percentage adjustments.

title: Create admin portal for dynamic feature flag adjustment with immediate effect
summary: Build intuitive administrative interface enabling real-time feature flag management with immediate propagation across all service instances. Portal must support role-based access control and audit logging for compliance.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: dynamic flag management via admin portal

title: Integrate real-time Geo-IP resolution service for user location determination
summary: Implement high-performance Geo-IP service integration for accurate user location detection. Service must handle millions of requests per hour with sub-5ms latency and maintain 99.9% uptime SLA.

title: Implement VPN/proxy detection and fallback to global defaults for ambiguous geo-data
summary: Build sophisticated VPN and proxy detection system to prevent geographic spoofing. Implement intelligent fallback logic ensuring consistent feature delivery when location cannot be reliably determined.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: VPN/proxy detection and fallback to global defaults

title: Build real-time analytics dashboard displaying adoption metrics by geography
summary: Create comprehensive analytics dashboard visualizing feature adoption rates across geographic segments. Dashboard must update in real-time, support custom date ranges, and enable drill-down analysis by country, region, and city.

title: Implement error rate monitoring and conversion KPI tracking by cohort
summary: Establish comprehensive monitoring for error rates and conversion metrics segmented by feature flag cohorts. System must track key performance indicators with 72-hour windows per geo-segment as specified.

title: Create automated alerting system for negative impact detection (errors/tickets spike)
summary: Build intelligent alerting system detecting anomalies in error rates and support ticket volumes. System must trigger alerts within minutes of threshold breach and support configurable sensitivity by feature flag.

title: Implement one-click rollback mechanism with <30 seconds execution time
summary: Design and implement instant rollback capability allowing administrators to revert feature flags to previous states within 30 seconds. System must maintain rollback history and ensure zero downtime during reversion.

title: Design user notification system for beta/staged rollout participation
summary: Create user-facing notification system informing users of their participation in beta features or staged rollouts. Notifications must be non-intrusive, dismissible, and comply with accessibility standards.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: user notification system for beta/staged rollout participation

title: Implement opt-out functionality for feature flag participation
summary: Build user-facing opt-out mechanism for feature flag participation, ensuring users can exclude themselves from experimental features. Must integrate with user preferences and persist across sessions.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: Compliance requirements include GDPR/CCPA adherence, user opt-out options

title: Ensure GDPR and CCPA compliance for geo-targeted delivery
summary: Implement full GDPR and CCPA compliance for geo-targeted feature delivery, including data processing restrictions, consent management, and regional data privacy requirements. Must support cross-border data transfer compliance.

title: Implement audit logging for Geo-IP mismatches and border-crossing events
summary: Create comprehensive audit logging system to track Geo-IP resolution discrepancies and user location changes across borders. Must capture timestamps, IP addresses, and detected locations for compliance and debugging.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: real-time Geo-IP resolution... full audit trails

title: Build rollback traceability system with full change history
summary: Develop complete rollback traceability infrastructure maintaining full change history for all feature flag modifications. System must enable one-click rollback within 30 seconds and preserve complete audit trail.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: automated alerts with one-click rollback (< 30 seconds)

title: Create onboarding documentation for product managers on feature flag setup
summary: Develop comprehensive onboarding documentation for product managers covering feature flag setup, configuration, and best practices. Include step-by-step guides for geo-targeting and percentage rollouts.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: dynamic flag management via admin portal

title: Develop developer documentation for feature flag analysis and implementation
summary: Create technical documentation for developers covering feature flag implementation, analysis tools, and integration patterns. Include API references, code examples, and troubleshooting guides.

title: Maintain comprehensive change log for all flag adjustments and rollbacks
summary: Implement persistent change logging system capturing all feature flag modifications, rollbacks, and configuration changes. Must support compliance audits and provide queryable history for analysis.

title: Upgrade authentication and session services for location awareness
summary: Enhance authentication and session management services to incorporate location-aware capabilities. Must support real-time Geo-IP resolution and maintain location state throughout user sessions for feature flag evaluation.
